content.raw: I spent some time this afternoon to better understand the `LiftDragPlugin` better and changed some stuff in 5537e0c. I centered the volumetric center of the body with the center of mass so that the submarine simply floats without any moments, and I corrected the axes of the `LiftDragPlugin`. If you apply a constant velocity of the joint between 5000-10000 radians/second, then the submarine will propel itself forward. Give it another try and let me know if it looks weird.
content.html: I spent some time this afternoon to better understand the LiftDragPlugin better and changed some stuff in 5537e0c. I centered the volumetric center of the body with the center of mass so that the submarine simply floats without any moments, and I corrected the axes of the LiftDragPlugin. If you apply a constant velocity of the joint between 5000-10000 radians/second, then the submarine will propel itself forward. Give it another try and let me know if it looks weird.
